definition: Bai Xianyong (1937-), Chinese-Taiwanese-US novelist of Hui descent

sentences.english: Kenneth Pai's(Pai Hsien-yung)novels are replete with profound retrospections of society and culture.
sentences.chinese: 白先勇的小說充滿了對社會和文化的深刻反思。

sentences.english: Baixianyong is a great artist who enjoyed the memory narration.
sentences.chinese: 白先勇是一位熱衷於回憶敘事的藝術大師。
